name: Report
short: Advanced user reporting system with staff quick actions
description: A comprehensive reporting system that allows users to report rule violations through commands or right-click context menus. Features staff quick-action buttons for muting, banning, blacklisting false reporters, and dismissing reports. Includes cooldown protection, blacklist management, and comprehensive logging.
author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Report cog! Use `[p]reportset` to configure the system. Set a report channel, add staff roles, and you're ready to go. Users can report with `[p]report @user reason` or right-click messages and select 'Report Message'.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user report statistics (total reports made, last report time) and blacklist status for preventing abuse. No personal data beyond Discord IDs is stored.
